about_the_game: The intention behind the making of this game was to induce a refreshing fear of the unknown in this psychological horror video game. As this is only a demo version of the game, players will be limited to the amount of space they can explore and actions they can perform. Set within the game is a maze for the player to navigate in the dark with only a flashlight at their disposal. The player's objective is to play a sadistic game of hide and seek against an unknown entity. They must find remains of this unknown entity before it finds them. Players can run, walk, crouch, and jump around the maze as they deem fit, but players will learn that hiding is not a viable option. As the players progress through the maze and familiarize themselves with the dark surrounding, they will encounter NPCs that will give chase. If caught, they player will lose and will have to restart this game of hide and seek. As Albert Einstein once said; "The definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over and expecting different results." Players must adapt and persevere in order to successfully beat the entity and hopefully escape this hellish game of hide and seek.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains nonplayable character cosmestic that looks like a child zombie.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent, AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 3600+ (2 * 1910) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7300 GT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Test your survival skills. You've awaken in an unfamiliar environment. Something, no everything, feels off. You are forced to play a sadistic game of hide and seek against an terrifyingly unknown entity. Can you find them before they find you?
